Highlights

MERIT Hydro: A high-resolution global hydrography map based on latest topography datasets

We develpped a global high-accuracy river topography map which are used as a baseline data for various Earth science studies.

A high-accuracy map of global terrain elevations

MERIT DEM. A Very precise global topography map by multiple error removal from spaceborne DEMs.

Coupound risk moelling of river flood and storm surge

High Resolution Modeling of River‐Floodplain‐Reservoir Inundation Dynamics in the Mekong River Basin
